alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Northern Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Washington County through 730 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dyer Township to near Fowler Township to near Grand Lake Stream. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Princeton, Grand Lake Stream, Dyer Township, Fowler Township, Codyville Plantation, Baileyville, Waite, Dyer, Fowler and Lambert Lake. This includes US Highway 1 between Princeton and Waite. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
